Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientMessageBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientMessageBuilder
public class ClientMessageBuilder extends Object
Class ClientMessageBuilder receives generic arraylist of data and a clientState to build state-specific messages which will be sent to the server

  • Method Details

    • buildMessageFromPlayerInput

      public Message buildMessageFromPlayerInput(ArrayList<Object> data, ClientState currentState)
      Method buildMessageFromPlayerInput calls a different message builder method accordingly to the client state
      Parameters:
      data - contains the informations to wrap into the message
      currentState - represents the client current state
      Returns:
      message to send to the server
